rows.label: qst105301_msg001
rows.name: LIST_QST105301の仮実装

rows.label: qst105301_msg002
rows.name:
ゲンブ頭部に兵士を駐屯させるつもりだが
自分たちだけで行くには時期が悪い

rows.label: qst105301_msg003
rows.name:
というのも
ゲンブ大雪原にいるエネミーたちが繁殖期に
入ったせいで気性が荒くなり暴れている

rows.label: qst105301_msg004
rows.name:
毎年部隊を編成して討伐しに行っているが
今年はジーク様がおられる
どうか力を貸して欲しい

rows.label: qst105301_msg005
rows.name:
雪山肉食動物はゲンブ大雪原で暴れている
討伐よろしく頼むよ

rows.label: qst105301_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, if it isn't his Majesty and his
fellow companions.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm afraid we have something of
a dilemma at the moment...

rows.label: qst105301_msg0003
rows.name:
As a nation, the Genbu Crown is
of paramount importance to us.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0004
rows.name:
Having no interaction with outsiders,
there has been little need to police
its borders...

rows.label: qst105301_msg0005
rows.name:
Until now, that is. The enemy took the
recent chaos as an opportunity to
infiltrate the place.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0006
rows.name:
We plan to station soldiers there
so that this may never be allowed
to happen again.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0007
rows.name:
This is, however, not an ideal time
to be sending our troops there.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0008
rows.name:
Breeding season is fast approaching
for the BQ1053mtCarnivs inhabiting
the Memorial Ruins.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0009
rows.name:
They're getting difficult to handle,
even for our soldiers. The rising of the
Cloud Sea has agitated them, I expect.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0010
rows.name:
We've been at a loss as to how to deal
with them. We can hardly sit by and
wait for them to calm down...

rows.label: qst105301_msg0011
rows.name:
You...you would help us? Oh, that
is excellent news!

rows.label: qst105301_msg0012
rows.name:
I can rest easy now knowing that his
Majesty and cohorts are on the job.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0013
rows.name:
Let's see... If you could cull 10 of their
number, I think we would be able to
dispatch our soldiers without hassle.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0014
rows.name: Do be careful, though.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0101
rows.name:
I'd like you to hunt down the
BQ1053mtCarnivs that inhabit
the Memorial Ruins.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0102
rows.name: Just be careful how you go.
